Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.gamecomponents.cards

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BaseFightAction
    BaseFightAction interface, implemented by the different cards
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractWeaponTest  
    AlternateFireWeapon
    Abstract class for the weapons with two alternative effects
    AlternativeEffectWeaponTest  
    AmmoTilesDeck
    Class implementing the Ammo Tiles Deck
    AmmoTilesDeckTest
    Test Class for the PowerUpDeck methods
    Card
    Abstract class that is the base for both weapons and powerUps
    DeckManagement
    Abstract class for the Deck Management; implements the basic methods of drawing and shuffling further the Constructor and getter methods;
    DeckTest
    Test class for the decks
    OneOptionalEffectWeapon
    Abstract class for the weapons with two alternative effects
    OptionalEffectWeaponTest
    Class to test generic weapon with optional efeftcs
    PowerUp
    This abstract class will be implemented by the game's PowerUp classes
    PowerUpDeck
    Class implementing the PowerUp Deck
    TwoEffectWeapon
    The abstract class for the weapon with two effetcs, that could be both alternative or optional
    TwoOptionalEffectWeapon
    Abstract class for teh weapons with three alternative effects
    Weapon
    Class that implements the abstracts weapons with only one base effects
    WeaponDeck
    Class implementing the Weapon Deck is just the concrete class of the DeckManagement Class, which methods covers each of the WeaponDeck functionality
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PowerUp.Usability
    Enum representing the usability of the powerUp: AS_ACTION: usable as action during the round WHILE_ACTION: usable during an action END_TURN: usable at the end of a round
